name: Headless People
description:
Your head is been hunted by a ghost, save yourself from the guy.

You have to blow up the house too.

Have fun!

Instructions :-

"E" to open doors.

"E" to pick up items

"W, A , S ,D" to move around

Requirements:-

Proccesor -core 2 duo

Graphics card - intel HD 4000

OS - Windows 7 and above

Ram - 6gb

#horror #survival #strategy
